callFunction:
callFunction(receiver: string, name: string, args: undefined, callback: undefined) → {void}

Calls a function exposed by another user.
expose:
expose(name: string, func: undefined) → {void}

Exposes the specified function to other users. Other users can use "callFunction" to call this function.
initCommunications:
initCommunications(address: string, port: number, user: string, password: string) → {void}

Initializes connection with MQTT broker. Currently only supports WebSocket.
initGlobalState:
initGlobalState(topicHeader: string, callback: undefined) → {void}

Initializes global state.
keepRunning:
keepRunning() → {void}

Keeps the program running so that messages can come in.
stopRunning:
stopRunning() → {void}

Removes interval that keeps the program running.
updateGlobalState:
updateGlobalState(path: string, updatedState: any) → {void}

Broadcasts the new states to all devices. Has ability to modify only part of the JSON state.
